title: Searching for best low priced computer to run Lol
body:
Searching for a temporary low priced computer to run Lol for my roomate...Will this do?
**DELL Optiplex 745 DT, INTEL Core 2 Duo-1.86, 4GB Memory,80Gb Hard drive, DVD-Rom ,Windows 10 Home 64 Bit(MAR)**
There is no more specifications on the product page then this. 
Tried to call in store and they wont answer also tried to find the inter graphics card included on the web, but this computer seems to be outdated.

It's the only thing he can afford so a tiny lag wont bother under lowest graphics.

replies.body:
Ballin' on a budget and trying to play League is definitely a tricky task. I remember when I started playing League back in S1, I was playing on a PC almost identical in specs that you've listed here. It was awful, and I was lucky to ever see 30fps. Luckily the client is much more optimized for a wide scale of hardware, so lower spec machines should see better performance than what has been seen in the past. :P

A good place to reference whether a PC will even run League is our [recommended and minimum system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) page. I've also seen some really interesting youtube videos specifically about running League on low spec PCs. Both [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sjChd4VkG1c) and [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g0yir6c5Qf0) are an awesome resource for seeing what options are available to play League on a tight budget.

Let me know if you have any questions.
